syncSettings.title: Cloud Synchronization
syncSettings.subtitle: Secure and sync your data
syncSettings.cloudSyncDescription: Securely back up your measurements and access them on all your devices.
syncSettings.securityDescription: All your data is end-to-end encrypted with a unique key.
syncSettings.recoveryDescription: Your recovery phrase allows you to restore your data on a new device.
syncSettings.recoveryPhraseMessage:
Please write down this recovery phrase and keep it safe. You'll need it if you ever need to recover your data on a new device: 

{{phrase}}
syncSettings.removeDeviceConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from your synced devices?
syncSettings.recoverDescription: Enter your recovery phrase to restore your data on this new device.
syncSettings.dataRestored: Your data has been successfully restored.
syncSettings.invalidPhrase: Invalid recovery phrase. Please check and try again.
syncSettings.recoveryError: An error occurred during recovery. Please try again.
syncSettings.backupKeyDescription: Backup your encryption key to the cloud (protected by the phrase)
syncSettings.restoreKeyDescription: Restore encryption key using your recovery phrase
syncSettings.backupNeeded: Backup the key after generating the phrase

welcome.title: Welcome to GlycoFlex
welcome.subtitle: Your intelligent companion for diabetes management. Track your blood glucose and improve your health with our advanced tools.
welcome.cloudSyncDesc: Save your data online and access it from all your devices.
welcome.secureDataDesc: Your medical information is encrypted and protected at all times.
welcome.multiDeviceDesc: Use the app on your phone, tablet, or computer.
welcome.analyticsDesc: Get personalized insights about your glucose trends.
welcome.getStartedDesc: Create a free account to unlock all features.
welcome.continueLocalDesc: You can also use the app without an account, but your data will remain on this device only.
